Common.Highlight.Common.Text: State/Pearl intersection is the heart of Albany’s financial/government district. Within walking distance are: NYS Capitol, Albany City Hall, City, State and County Courts, Times Union Center, SUNY Headquarters, Legislative Office Building, Empire State Plaza
Second floor space has direct access to State Street
Bright space - windows on all sides
Former bank branch on first floor

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Northwest corner of North Pearl and State Streets in the heart of downtown Albany

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Offered for sale is a four story ±40,722 SF office building in Albany’s Central Business District
